lead_paragraph: The Saudi stock market regulator has ordered six investors to pay a total 278.1 million riyals ($74.16 million) for trading violations, it said in a statement on Saturday.
snippet: The Saudi bourse regulator has ordered six investors to pay a total $74.16 million for trading violations, it said Saturday.
abstract: The Saudi bourse regulator has ordered six investors to pay a total $74.16 million for trading violations, it said Saturday.
